FuncDef:
The display pce protocol lsp command displays the lsp database information.
The display pce protocol stitch-label command displays the label stitch database information.
CLIs: display pce protocol lsp [ client <pcc-ip-address> ] [ symbolic-path-name <path-name> ]

ParaDef.Info:
PCC IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of an explicit path.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the PLSP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967294.

Displays information about a specified label.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: Ingress-LSR-ID   Egress-LSR-ID    Tunnel-ID LSP-ID Delegate LSP-State
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check LSP DB information saved on a PCE server, run the display pce protocol lsp command on a PCE client.
To view basic stitching information, run the display pce protocol stitch-label command.
